testcase.purpose: Check that block the parent content to access the child iframe content of sandbox if sandbox attribute exists
Check that allow script to exec inside iframe with sandbox attribute if sandbox='allow-scripts'
Check that allow to auto play HTML5 Video inside iframe with sandbox attribute if sandbox='allow-scripts'
Check that allow sandbox iframe to access other content from the same origin if sandbox='allow-same-origin'
Check if the value of sandbox attribute must be an unordered set of unique space-separated tokens
Check if the iframe.contentWindow attribute exists
Check if the iframe.height attribute exists
Check if the iframe.name attribute exists
Check if the iframe.sandbox attribute exists
Check if the iframe.srcdoc attribute exists
Check if the iframe.src attribute exists
Check if the iframe.width attribute exists
Block form submission inside iframe with sandbox attribute

step.expected: Test passes if there is no red on the page and there is no navigation in the below iframe after following the above steps

testcase.purpose: Check if the iframe.contentWindow attribute must return the WindowProxy object of the object element's nested browsing context, if it has one
Check if the iframe.contentDocument attribute exists
Check if the iframe.contentDocument attribute must return the Document object of the active document of the iframe element's nested browsing context
Check if the iframe.height attribute is of type DOMString
Check if the iframe.height attribute must reflect the respective content attributes of the same name
Check if the iframe.height attribute return empty string that it been set empty string
Check if the iframe.name attribute is of type DOMString
Check if the iframe.name attribute must reflect the respective content attributes of the same name,the value is empty string
Check if iframe.name default value is empty string
Check if the iframe.name attribute must reflect the respective content attributes of the same name
Check if the iframe.src attribute must be a valid non-empty URL potentially surrounded by spaces if the attribute present
Check if the iframe.src attribute is of type DOMString
Check if the iframe.srcdoc attribute is of type DOMString
Check if the srcdoc attribute default value is empty string
Check if the iframe.srcdoc attribute return empty string if it been set empty string
Check if the iframe.srcdoc attribute must reflect the respective content attributes of the same name
Check if the iframe.width attribute is of type DOMString
Test checks that iframe.width attribute default value is empty string
Check if the iframe.width attribute return null if it been set empty string
Check if the iframe.width attribute must reflect the respective content attributes of the same name
Check if the iframe.sandbox attribute default value is empty string
Check if the iframe.contentWindow.document attribute return the Document object of the active document
Check if the iframe.height attribute been set float integers value that it clientHeight is valid non-negative integers
Check if the iframe.height attribute been set negative integers value that it clientHeight is valid non-negative integers
Check if iframe.sandbox attribute set 'allow-same-origin',then compare iframe.sandbox is 'allow-same-origin'
Check if iframe.sandbox attribute set 'allow-same-origin,allow-forms,allow-scripts',then compare HTMLIFrameElement.sandbox is 'allow-same-origin,allow-forms,allow-scripts'
Check if the iframe.sandbox return allow-scripts that it been set value same name
Check if the iframe.sandbox return allow-top-navigation that it been set value same name
Check if the iframe.src attribute must reflect the respective content attributes of the same name
Check if the attribute srcdoc of iframe,srcdoc quotes have to be escaped
Check if src attribute and the srcdoc attribute are both specified together, the srcdoc attribute takes priority
Check if the iframe.width attribute been set float value that it clientWidth is valid non-negative integers
Check if the iframe.width attribute been set negative integers value that it clientWidth is valid non-negative integers
